name: Peasant and the Ghost Demo
description:
Peasant and the Ghost

Controls not working? Click on the game frame to be able to control the game character with the arrow keys.

This game demo was made for a Game Design course at the Norwegian University of Science and Technology: https://www.ntnu.no/studier/emner/TPD4168

See a full game walkthrough here

Game designers:
Daniel Eriksen
Emil Orvik Kollstrøm
